Journey to Civic Tech with Cyrus Sethna 🏃🏽

Aug 29, 2018

  • civictech
  • episode
  • politics
  • net neutrality

For this episode we talk to Cyrus Sethna about their journey into civic tech. Cyrus works in the United States Digital Service and is an avid member of Code for DC. We delve into that story, truths he’s discovered along the way, and we learn about something called ‘The National Day of Civic Crafting.’ You won’t want to miss this one.
